p1: .com’s goal is to make it easier, faster and cheaper for all companies and organizations to connect with their current and prospective customers to improve their products,services and offerings.
p2: .com is also focused on providing an unparalleled panelist experience. With the multitude of places to take surveys online we pride ourselves on valuing our member’s efforts and rewarding them accordingly.
p3: is a leader in the video game market research industry. Video game surveys as well as relevant consumer survey opportunities serve to offer our users an unparalleled panelist experience.
p4: With the multitude of places to take surveys online we pride ourselves on valuing our member’s efforts, serving up fun and relevant survey opportunities and rewarding them accordingly.We share a large percentage of our revenue with our panelists on surveys they complete and we offer the panelists multiple opportunities to earn money and rewards.
p5: com is also focused on providing an unparalleled panelist experience.With the multitude of places to take surveys online we pride ourselves on valuing our member’s efforts,and rewarding them accordingly.We share a large percentage of our revenue with our panelists on surveys they complete and we offer the panelists multiple opportunities to earn money and rewards.
p6: We share 35% of our revenue with our panelists on surveys they complete and offer the opportunity to earn up to 50% through our Downline program.
